mapper.select:
select
from order_rates
order by add_time desc

select
from order_rates
order by add_time desc

select count(*) as total_orders, count(CASE WHEN rate_arrival = 0 THEN 1 ELSE null END) as total_arrival_0, count(CASE WHEN rate_arrival = 1 THEN 1 ELSE null END) as total_arrival_1, SUM(rate_attitude) as total_attitude, SUM(rate_skill) as total_skill from order_rates
